name: MAYURBHANJ BIOLOGICAL RESEARCH
briefDescription: The Mayurbhanj Biological Research(MBR) was founded in 24th December 1999 By Samir Kumar Sahu with the commitment and dedication of environmentalist, social activist, development researchers and experts in a variety of professions, plans were carried forward to create a private entity dedicated to the effective conservation research  , education on flora & fauna of Similipal, & the other Biosphere Reserves of India. With a motto of Protection of five “J’s” of Environment (Jal, Jamin, Jungle, Jan, and Jeevan) in the course of time, MBR got involved in E-Governances(IT) , Higher Education and  Bioscientific  activities for the interest of the Global people.
